parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of ECS instances. You can specify 1 to 100 instance IDs.

parameters.name: RamRoleName
parameters.description: The name of the instance RAM role. You can call the [ListRoles](~~28713~~) operation of RAM to query the names of available instance RAM roles.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
